title: Eligibility Verification Schema
description:
Create Eligibility Verification Schema

Design and implement a comprehensive data schema for healthcare eligibility verification that handles both incoming verification requests and outgoing responses with coverage details.

Requirements:
- Define request schema with required fields:
  * Patient/member identifying information (ID, name, DOB, etc.)
  * Insurance provider details
  * Service type or procedure codes being verified
  * Date of service or service period
  * Requesting provider/facility information

- Define response schema with coverage information:
  * Eligibility status (active, inactive, pending)
  * Coverage effective dates (start/end)
  * Benefit details (deductibles, copays, coinsurance, out-of-pocket max)
  * Coverage limits and exclusions
  * Prior authorization requirements
  * In-network vs out-of-network benefits

- Include error handling schema:
  * Validation errors for malformed requests
  * Not found or invalid member scenarios
  * System errors or timeout responses

- Ensure compliance considerations:
  * HIPAA compliance for PHI handling
  * Standard format compatibility (X12 270/271, HL7, or similar)

- Add field validation rules:
  * Required vs optional fields
  * Data type constraints
  * Format specifications (dates, IDs, codes)

- Support versioning for schema evolution
